Baked Lemon Pudding

Baked Lemon Pudding

serves 4 to 6

Roasted Pepper Black Bean Soup

Half a batch of boiled beans

Puree in the blender

Half a batch of Roasted Tomato Sauce

Stir the bean puree into the tomato sauce.

Heat gently on the stove & serve.
